item.description:
Please Update your RSVP. More details posted. Contact Kevin if any questions.

Join Coach Kevin and all of his SuphaFans for his Annual SupahFan's Fenway Pub Crawl around Fenway Park and Kenmore Square during Futures at Fenway Day on Saturday, August 20.

The fun begins at 12pm at The SuphaFans Store at 470 Commonwealth Avenue.

"Fenway Drinking Team" Shirts are available for only $10 at the SuphaFans Store

Drinking Team members should get a little special treatment from the bars.  Upgrade to a a 6-Pack for $60.00

 

Join the crawl at the Store, at your favorite venue or whenever. If you're not finding the group at the scheduled bar, check the previous or latter bars.  Still having trouble finding them?  Text or call Kevin's cell at 617-838-3337 for the group's current location.

The fun ends at the BaseBall Tavern hours later or whenever!

 

Crawl Venues are as follows:

Batting Practice (Noon): The SuphaFans Store

1st Inning (Noonish): The Lower Depths

2nd Inning (1 pm): Cask'n Flagon  

3rd Inning (2 pm): Who's On First?

4th Inning (3 pm): Boston Beerworks

5th Inning (4 pm): Game On!

6th Inning (5 pm): The Bleacher Bar

7th Inning (6 pm): The House of Blues

8th Inning (7 pm): Lansdowne Pub

9th Inning (8 pm): Jerry Remy's

Extra Innings (9 pm): The Baseball Tavern

 

Invite other Natives, friends, guests, co workers, family... All are welcome.

Please remember to maintain your own bar and food tabs and tip your servers.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at SuphaFan's Store at 12pm or Join on The Posted Crawl Venues (To Be Updated)
item.why:
3rd Annual Fenway Pub Crawl - each year, the same Saturday as The Red Sox' Futures at Fenway Minor League games.
Baseball plays 9 Innings so we Play at 9 Bars - changing once an hour.
Come join other SupahFans for a day-and-night of SupahFun!
item.name: 3rd Annual SupahFan's Pub Crawl Around Fenway Park and Kenmore Square
